feed.title: Typemill Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Typemill: Version 2.16.0
entry.content: This release revamps the media library. Please note that this release does not include the vendor folder, use composer update to load the dependencies before you start using Typemill.

entry.title: New release for Typemill: Version 2.16.1
entry.content: This is a hotfix release: Image upload in meta-tabs and image component works again, favicon upload works again, and resizing of small images is without black background now.

entry.title: New release for Typemill: Release 2.17.1
entry.content:
• FEATURE: You can add a link to an article to your promts that gets send as an example. Use it e.g. for tonality.
  • FEATURE: You can filter unused media now to clean up the media library.
  • FEATURE: You can now add media from the media library to the raw markdown editor.
  • FEATURE: An official DockerHub-version has been launched.
  • FIX: Last modified date is working correctly again.
  • FIX: Typo in ApiCall model.
  • FIX: Attributes for headlines work again.
  • FIX: Duplicated headlines are now in the ToC as long as they do not have the same level. To add same headlines with same level to the ToC, add an ID to the headline manually.
  • FIX: External link on homepage in publisher is now clickable again.
  • UPDATE: Added more understandable placefolder for add new page/folder
  • UPDATE: ru language file.
  • PLUGIN: A new cookie plugin by Giuseppe Chiesa has been published
  • PLUGIN: A new swipe plugin by Josef Pavlik for large image view has been published.
  • PLUGIN: A new newsletter plugin for KIT and Mailerlite has been published.

entry.title: New release for Typemill: 2.17.3
entry.content:
• Fixed an error with the session initialization, session-related plugins like the email plugin should work again now.
  • Fixed the docker setup so that media folders are created with persistant mode.
  • Fix endless loop in getImageFiles and fix storage model so it checks if dir exists

entry.title: New release for Typemill: V2.17.4 Fix Old Input
entry.content:
• Fix handling of old input so it is still available in frontend after a redirect
  • Fix empty paragraph in twig formbuilder
